# Storm (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | Ishtishia, The Mockery, [[Procan]], Umberlee |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** You gain resistance to electricity 5.

**Storm Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Entropic Shield (Spell)|Entropic Shield]]****:** Ranged attacks against you have 20% miss chance.

**2** **[[Gust of Wind (Spell)|Gust of Wind]]****:** Blows away or knocks down smaller creatures.

**3** **[[Call Lightning (Spell)|Call Lightning]]****:** Calls down lightning bolts (3d6 per bolt) from sky.

**4** **[[Sleet Storm (Spell)|Sleet Storm]]****:** Hampers vision and movement.

**5** **[[Ice Storm (Spell)|Ice Storm]]****:** Hail deals 5d6 damage in cylinder 40 ft. across.

**6** **[[Summon Monster VI (Spell)|Summon Monster VI]]**** \*:** Calls extraplanar creature to fight for you.

**7** **[[Control Weather (Spell)|Control Weather]]****:** Changes weather in local area.

**8** **[[Whirlwind (Spell)|Whirlwind]]****:** Cyclone deals damage and can pick up creatures.

**9** **[[Storm of Vengeance (Spell)|Storm of Vengeance]]****:** Storm rains acid, lightning, and hail.


| **Source:** | Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 280 |
|---|---|
| | Stormwrack (WotC), pg. 110 |
